name: Pokémon Defenders Beta
description:
Pokémon Defenders is a tower defense game based on a (really terrible) project game!

This is the beta/deaf version because there are still minor things I would like to add and there isn't much in the way of sound at the moment!

Pokémon will attack in waves, your task is to defend your chosen legendary Pokémon.

Placing and upgrading your Defenders will cost Berries which are earned for each attacking Pokémon you defeat and at the end of the wave depending on your performance.

The attack Power, Speed and Range differ between each Defender and their attacks will be either Physical or Special, but each Pokémon also has a different ability.

Clefairy - Attacks are both Physical and Special using the median value of the target's Defense + Special Defense. Clefairy will deal more damage as more of them are placed.

Ariados - The lowest damage Defender, but the movement of targets will be reduced. Ariados will not attack a target whose speed has already been reduced.

Claydol - Able to attack multiple targets but at a reduced power.

Swalot - Deals low damage, but will inflict Poison and deal damage over time. Swalot will not attack a target who is already Poisoned.

Scyther - Attacks quickly and ignores an amount of the target's Defense.

Gardevoir - Attacks will reduce the target's Special Defense for a short time.

Dusknoir - Attack power increases for each effect active on the target.

Machoke - Short range but powerful, attacks will reduce the target's Defense.

If an attacker reaches your chosen legendary Pokémon then they will be defeated, however this will also consume a portion of your Berries!

If your defenses are about to be breached it may be better to place one last unit to save yourself, the greatest rewards can only be gained by coming close to defeat!
